vote.title: Authorize Supplemental Agreement No. 1 to the professional engineering services contract with Gresham Smith for additional engineering services for Phase I of the Jefferson Boulevard Viaduct Modification and Realignment project to support the demolition of a portion of the Kay Bailey Hutchison Convention Center Dallas (KBHCCD) over Lamar Street and the demolition of the Jefferson Boulevard Viaduct/South Market Street bridge, including associated work with the KBHCCD – Not to exceed $352,916.00, from $3,356,179.88 to $3,709,095.88  – Financing: Convention Center Construction Fund
vote.description: Authorize Supplemental Agreement No. 1 to the professional engineering services contract with Gresham Smith for additional engineering services for Phase I of the Jefferson Boulevard Viaduct Modification and Realignment project to support the demolition of a portion of the Kay Bailey Hutchison Convention Center Dallas (KBHCCD) over Lamar Street and the demolition of the Jefferson Boulevard Viaduct/South Market Street bridge, including associated work with the KBHCCD – Not to exceed $352,916.00, from $3,356,179.88 to $3,709,095.88  – Financing: Convention Center Construction Fund
